vuetify-gen
快速开始
github
快速开始
github
  • 快速开始
    • install
    • create plugins/vuetify-gen.js

  • 扩展组件

# install

npm install vuetify-gen --save

# create plugins/vuetify-gen.js

import Vue from 'vue'
// your plugins/vuetify
import vuetify from './vuetify'
import * as components from 'vuetify-gen/lib/components'
import vuetifyGen from 'vuetify-gen'

Vue.use(vuetifyGen, {
  vuetify,
  components
})
